MK_Info_PowerAllot.sql: SELECT pt.ID AS ID,pt.PowerGroupID AS PowerGroupID,pr.PowerName AS PowerName,pr.Notes,pr.MenuAddress AS MenuAddress,pt.CreateUser AS CreateUser,pt.CreateDate AS CreateDate,pt.ShowMark,CASE pt.Status WHEN '0' THEN N'未授权' WHEN '1' THEN N'授权'ELSE N'未知' END AS Status FROM MK_Info_PowerAllot AS pt JOIN dbo.MK_Info_PowerGroup AS pp ON pt.PowerGroupID=pp.ID AND pp.ShowMark='Y' JOIN dbo.MK_Type_Power AS pr ON pt.PowerID=pr.ID AND pr.ShowMark='Y' WHERE pt.PowerGroupID=@PowerGroupID AND pt.ShowMark='Y' ORDER BY pt.CreateDate DESC
UPDATE MK_Info_PowerAllot SET Status =@Status,CreateUser=@CreateUser,CreateDate=@CreateDate WHERE ID=@ID AND ShowMark='Y'
UPDATE MK_Info_PowerAllot SET Status ='1',CreateUser=@CreateUser,CreateDate=@CreateDate WHERE PowerGroupID=@PowerGroupID AND ShowMark='Y'

SELECT pt.ID AS ID, CASE pt.Status WHEN '1' THEN N'授权' WHEN '0' THEN N'未授权' ELSE N'未知' END AS Status, pt.CreateUser AS CreateUser, pt.CreateDate AS CreateDate, pr.PowerName AS PowerName FROM dbo.MK_Info_PowerAllot AS pt JOIN dbo.MK_Type_Power AS pr ON pt.PowerID=pr.ID AND pr.ShowMark='Y' JOIN dbo.MK_Info_PowerGroup AS pp ON pt.PowerGroupID=pp.ID AND pp.ShowMark='Y' WHERE pt.PowerGroupID=@PowerGroupID AND pt.Status='1' AND pt.ShowMark='Y' ORDER BY pt.CreateDate DESC
